about_the_game:
They said you are the modern incarnation of Noah.
The Asimov Organization put their faith in you.
Every established Lighthouse marked the sacrifice of the members.
Yet the robotic butlers are so strong, so unfathomable and so prepared.
Can you make it to the Ark?

Robopocalypse cyberpunk
The 12 cities are depressing, deprived and cordoned off. Impulse device and watchtowers are deployed all over the regions. Robotic butlers and wardens are everywhere. Material privation has been enforced for a very long period. Remember to get back home before the night.

Rouge lite survival experience
Thirst, hunger, robot butlers at night, physical and mental disorders and many other unfavorable conditions. Survive in this deprived world is harder than ever before. Plan your days, plan your route, get away from the hunt down of the robotic butlers.

Brutal and sophisticated combat
Multiple combat styles can be developed combining close combat and adaptive abilities variously. 12 implicit occupations available.

Elaborated genetic adaptations
Utilize the mysterious technology preserved by the Asimov Organization to gain the power of Noah. Reveal the mystery as you explore more.

name: Asimov Laws

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit/ Windows 8 64 Bit/ Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 (1GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7770 (1GB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit/ Windows 8 64 Bit/ Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 7 1600X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 780 Ti/970 or AMD R9 290/AMD RX480
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Asimov Laws is a brutal rouge lite survival game, set in the depressing Robopocalypse world. Survive the harsh condition in the 12 cities, Crush the robotic butlers, scavenge and survive, plan your days and route, grow stronger through genetic transition and head for the Ark.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
